trans-unit.source: User-defined variables are variables which can be created by the user and exist in the session. This means that no one can access user-defined variables that have been set by another user, and when the session is closed these variables expire. However, these variables can be shared between several queries and stored programs.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的变量是可由用户创建并存在于会话中的变量。这意味着没有人可以访问由另一用户设置的用户定义的变量，并且在会话关闭时，这些变量将过期。但是，这些变量可以在几个查询和存储的程序之间共享。

trans-unit.source: User-defined variables can be used in most MariaDB's statements and clauses which accept an SQL expression. However there are some exceptions, like the LIMIT clause.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的变量可以在大多数接受SQL表达式的MariaDB语句和子句中使用。但是，也有一些例外，例如LIMIT子句。

trans-unit.source: User-defined variables cannot be declared. They can be read even if no value has been set yet; in that case, they are NULL. To set a value for a user-defined variable you can use:
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的变量不能被声明,即使还没有设置值,也可以被读取;在这种情况下,它们是NULL。即使还没有设置值,它们也可以被读取;在这种情况下,它们是NULL。要为用户定义的变量设置一个值,你可以使用。

trans-unit.source: User-defined variables names must be preceded by a single at character (@). While it is safe to use a reserved word as a user-variable name, the only allowed characters are ASCII letters, digits, dollar sign ($), underscore (_) and dot (.). If other characters are used, the name can be quoted in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的变量名称必须在前面加上一个at字符（ @ ）。使用保留字作为用户变量名是安全的，但是唯一允许的字符是ASCII字母，数字，美元符号（ $ ），下划线（ _ ）和点（ . ）。如果使用其他字符，则可以通过以下方式之一对该名称进行引用：

trans-unit.source: User-variables names are case insensitive, though they were case sensitive in MySQL 4.1 and older versions.
trans-unit.target: 用户变量名称不区分大小写,尽管在MySQL 4.1和旧版本中它们是区分大小写的。

trans-unit.source: Using TEXT or BLOB in a SELECT query that uses temporary tables for storing intermediate results will force the temporary table to be disk based (using the Aria storage engine instead of the memory storage engine, which is a bit slower. This is not that bad as the Aria storage engine caches the rows in memory. To get the benefit of this, one should ensure that the aria_pagecache_buffer_size variable is big enough to hold most of the row and index data for temporary tables.
trans-unit.target: 在使用临时表存储中间结果的SELECT查询中使用TEXT或BLOB将强制该临时表基于磁盘（使用Aria存储引擎而不是内存存储引擎，这有点慢。这并不像在晓月存储引擎缓存在内存中的行。要获得这样做的好处，一是应确保aria_pagecache_buffer_size变量是大到足以容纳大多数临时表的行和索引数据。

trans-unit.source: Using 255.255.255.255 is equivalent to not using a netmask at all.
trans-unit.target: 使用 255.255.255.255 等效于根本不使用网络掩码。

trans-unit.source: Using Streaming replication, the node breaks huge transactions up into smaller and more manageable fragments, it then replicates these fragments to the cluster as it works instead of waiting for the commit. Once certified, the fragment can no longer be aborted by conflicting transactions. As this can have performance consequences both during execution and in the event of rollback, it is recommended that you only use it with large transactions that are unlikely to experience conflict.
trans-unit.target: 使用流式复制,节点将庞大的事务分解成更小、更易管理的碎片,然后它在工作时将这些碎片复制到集群,而不是等待提交。一旦通过认证,该片段就不能再因为冲突的事务而中止。由于这在执行过程中和回滚时都会对性能产生影响,因此建议你只将其用于不太可能发生冲突的大型事务。

This is not that bad as the Aria storage engine caches the rows in memory. To get the benefit of this, one should ensure that the aria_pagecache_buffer_size variable is big enough to hold most of the row and index data for temporary tables.

trans-unit.source: Using an in-memory table (as described above) is usually the fastest option for GROUP BY if the result set is small. It is not optimal if the result set is very big. You can tell the optimizer this by using SELECT SQL_SMALL_RESULT or SELECT SQL_BIG_RESULT.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果集较小，则使用内存表（如上所述）通常是GROUP BY的最快选择。如果结果集很大，则不是最佳选择。您可以使用 SELECT SQL_SMALL_RESULT 或 SELECT SQL_BIG_RESULT 告诉优化器。

trans-unit.source: Using parentheses in your SQL allows you to control the order of execution for SELECT statements and Table Value Constructor, including UNION, EXCEPT, and INTERSECT operations. trans-unit.source: Using the Extent Map, ColumnStore can perform logical range partitioning and only retrieve the blocks needed to satisfy the query. trans-unit.source: Using the value current_pos causes the slave to set its position based on the gtid_current_pos system variable, which is a union of gtid_binlog_pos and gtid_slave_pos. Using the value slave_pos causes the slave to instead set its position based on the gtid_slave_pos system variable.

trans-unit.source: Using this argument, MariaDB prints the argument list to stdout and then exits. You may find this useful in debugging to see how the options are set for the utility.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个参数,MariaDB会将参数列表打印到stdout,然后退出。你可能会发现这在调试时很有用,可以看到实用程序的选项是如何设置的。

trans-unit.source: Using this command option, Mariabackup performs a backup operation on your database or databases. The backups are written to the target directory, as set by the --target-dir option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此命令选项，Mariabackup对一个或多个数据库执行备份操作。备份将写入 --target-dir 选项设置的目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Using this command option, you can set Mariabackup to stream the backup files to stdout in the given format. Currently, the supported format is xbstream.
trans-unit.target: 使用此命令选项，可以将Mariabackup设置为以给定格式将备份文件流式传输到stdout。当前，支持的格式是 xbstream 。

trans-unit.source: Using this command, Mariabackup copies the backup from the target directory to the data directory, as defined by the --datadir option. You must stop the MariaDB Server before running this command. The data directory must be empty. If you want to overwrite the data directory with the backup, use the --force-non-empty-directories option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此命令，Mariabackup拷贝从目标目录的data目录备份，由定义 --datadir 选项。您必须先停止MariaDB服务器，然后再运行此命令。数据目录必须为空。如果要使用备份覆盖数据目录，请使用 --force-non-empty-directories 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this command, Mariabackup moves the backup from the target directory to the data directory, as defined by the --datadir option. You must stop the MariaDB Server before running this command. The data directory must be empty. If you want to overwrite the data directory with the backup, use the --force-non-empty-directories option.
trans-unit.target: 使用该命令，从Mariabackup目标目录数据目录移动备份，由所限定 --datadir 选项。您必须先停止MariaDB服务器，然后再运行此命令。数据目录必须为空。如果要使用备份覆盖数据目录，请使用 --force-non-empty-directories 选项。

trans-unit.target: 将此选项与 --backup 命令选项一起使用会使操作递增，而不是完全覆盖。Mariabackup仅从 .ibd 文件中复制页面，如果它们比指定目录中的备份新。

trans-unit.source: Using this option with the --backup command option makes the operation incremental rather than a complete overwrite. When this option is specified, either the --incremental-lsn or --incremental-basedir options can also be given. If neither option is given, option --incremental-basedir is used by default, set to the first timestamped backup directory in the backup base directory.
trans-unit.target: 将此选项与 --backup 命令选项一起使用会使操作递增，而不是完全覆盖。指定此选项后，还可以指定 --incremental-lsn or --incremental-basedir options can also be given. If neither option is given, option is used by default, set to the first timestamped backup directory in the backup base directory. 选项--incremental-basedir ，设置为备份基础目录中第一个带时间戳的备份目录。

trans-unit.source: Using this option you can define the destination directory for the backup. Mariabackup writes all backup files to this directory. Mariabackup will create the directory, if it does not exist (but it will not create the full path recursively, i.e. at least parent directory if the --target-dir must exist=
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项可以定义备份的目标目录。Mariabackup 将所有备份文件写入该目录。如果该目录不存在,Mariabackup 将创建该目录(但不会递归创建完整的路径,即至少是父目录,如果 --target-dir 必须存在=)。

trans-unit.source: Using this option you, you can set the base name for Mariabackup to use in log sequences.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,您可以设置Mariabackup在日志序列中使用的基本名称。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, Mariabackup prints to stdout the MariaDB Server options that the utility requires to run the --copy-back command option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，Mariabackup会打印以输出该实用程序运行 --copy-back 命令选项所需的MariaDB Server 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can configure Mariabackup to dump its core to file in the event that it encounters fatal signals. You may find this useful for review and debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个选项,你可以配置Mariabackup在遇到致命信号时将其核心转储到文件。你可能会发现这对审查和调试目的很有用。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can control how Mariabackup retrieves the server's binary log coordinates corresponding to the backup.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项,您可以控制Mariabackup如何检索与备份对应的服务器二进制日志坐标。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define a default option file for Mariabackup. Unlike the --defaults-extra-file option, when this option is provided, it completely replaces all default option files.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以为Mariabackup 定义默认选项文件。与 --defaults-extra-file 选项不同，提供此选项后，它将完全替换所有默认选项文件。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define an extra default option file for Mariabackup. Unlike --defaults-file, this file is read after the default option files are read, allowing you to only overwrite the existing defaults.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以为Mariabackup 定义一个额外的默认选项文件。与 --defaults-file 不同，此文件在读取默认选项文件之后读取，从而仅覆盖现有的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the UNIX domain socket you want to use when connecting to a local database server. The option accepts a string argument. For more information, see the mysql --help command.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以定义在连接到本地数据库服务器时要使用的UNIX域套接字。该选项接受字符串参数。有关更多信息，请参见 mysql --help 命令。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the buffer pool size for Mariabackup. Use it instead of buffer_pool_size.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义Mariabackup的缓冲池大小。使用它而不是 buffer_pool_size 。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the copy interval Mariabackup uses between checks done by the log copying thread. The given value is in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,可以定义Mariabackup在日志复制线程所做的检查之间的复制间隔。给定的值以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the encryption plugin you want to load. It is only used during the --prepare phase to load the encryption plugin. It defaults to the server --plugin-load option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以定义要加载的加密插件。它仅在 --prepare 阶段用于加载加密插件。它默认为服务器 --plugin-load 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the host to use when connecting to a MariaDB Server over TCP/IP. By default, Mariabackup attempts to connect to the local host.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,可以定义通过TCP/IP连接到MariaDB服务器时要使用的主机。默认情况下,Mariabackup会尝试连接到本地主机。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the maximum number of file descriptors Mariabackup reserves with setrlimit().
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以使用 setrlimit() 定义Mariabackup保留的文件描述符的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the path Mariabackup reads for MariaDB Server plugins. It only uses it during the --prepare phase to load the encryption plugin. It defaults to the plugin_dir server system variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义Mariabackup为MariaDB Server插件读取的路径。它仅在 --prepare 阶段使用它来加载加密插件。它默认为 plugin_dir 服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the path to a directory Mariabackup uses in writing temporary files. If you want to use more than one, separate the values by a semicolon (that is, ;). When passing multiple temporary directories, it cycles through them using round-robin.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义Mariabackup在写入临时文件时使用的目录的路径。如果要使用多个，请用分号（即 ; ）分隔值。当传递多个临时目录时，它会使用轮询循环遍历它们。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the path to the source directory. This is the directory that Mariabackup reads for the data it backs up. It should be the same as the MariaDB Server datadir system variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义源目录的路径。这是Mariabackup读取其备份数据的目录。它应该与MariaDB Server datadir 系统变量相同。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the sequence number (LSN) value for --backup operations. During backups, Mariabackup only copies .ibd pages newer than the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以为 --backup 操作定义序列号（LSN）值。在备份期间，Mariabackup仅复制比指定值新的 .ibd 页面。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the specific database or databases you want to back up. In cases where you have a particularly large database or otherwise only want to back up a portion of it, you can optionally also define the tables on the database.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,您可以定义您要备份的特定数据库或数据库。如果你有一个特别大的数据库,或者只想备份其中的一部分,你还可以选择定义数据库上的表。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define the specific database or databases you want to exclude from the backup process. You may find it useful when you want to back up most databases on the server or tables on a database, but would like to exclude a few from the process.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项,您可以定义要从备份过程中排除的特定数据库。当您想备份服务器上的大多数数据库或数据库上的表,但又想从进程中排除几个数据库时,您可能会发现它很有用。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define what tables you want Mariabackup to back up from the database. The table values are defined using Regular Expressions. To define the tables you want to exclude from the backup, see the --tables-exclude option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义要从数据库备份Mariabackup的表。表值是使用正则表达式定义的。要定义要从备份中排除的表，请参见 --tables-exclude 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can define what tables you want Mariabackup to exclude from the backup. The table values are defined using Regular Expressions. To define the tables you want to include from the backup, see the --tables option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以定义希望Mariabackup从备份中排除的表。表值是使用正则表达式定义的。要定义要包括在备份中的表，请参见 --tables 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can disable Mariabackup version check. If you would like to enable the version check, use the --version-check option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以禁用Mariabackup版本检查。如果要启用版本检查，请使用 --version-check 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can enable Mariabackup version check. If you would like to disable the version check, use the --no-version-check option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以启用Mariabackup版本检查。如果要禁用版本检查，请使用 --no-version-check 选项。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can print the Mariabackup version information to stdout.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,可以将Mariabackup版本信息打印到stdout。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can set a limit on the I/O operations Mariabackup performs per second in IOS values. It is only used during the --backup command option.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以设置Mariabackup每秒在IOS值中执行的I / O操作的限制。仅在 --backup 命令选项期间使用。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can set a path to a file listing the tables you want to back up. Mariabackup iterates over each line in the file. The format is database.table.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以为列出要备份的表的文件设置路径。Mariabackup遍历文件中的每一行。格式为 database.table 。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can set it accept client connections to the server when using the older protocol, from before 4.1.1. By default, it refuses these connections. Use the --secure-auth option to explicitly enable it.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，您可以将其设置为接受来自4.1.1之前的较旧协议时服务器的客户端连接。默认情况下，它拒绝这些连接。使用 --secure-auth 选项可以显式启用它。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can set it explicitly to refuse client connections to the server when using the older protocol, from before 4.1.1. This feature is enabled by default. Use the --skip-secure-auth option to disable it.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，可以将其显式设置为从4.1.1之前的版本开始，拒绝使用旧协议的客户端与服务器的连接。默认情况下启用此功能。使用 --skip-secure-auth 选项将其禁用。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can set the number of threads Mariabackup uses for parallel data file transfers. By default, it is set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项,可以设置Mariabackup用于并行数据文件传输的线程数。默认情况下,它被设置为1。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can tell Mariabackup that you want to close file handles. Without this option, Mariabackup keeps files open in order to manage DDL operations. When working with particularly large tablespaces, closing the file can make the backup more manageable. However, it can also lead to inconsistent backups. Use at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个选项,你可以告诉Mariabackup你要关闭文件句柄。如果没有这个选项,Mariabackup会保持文件打开,以便管理DDL操作。在处理特别大的表空间时,关闭文件可以使备份更容易管理。然而,它也可能导致备份不一致。使用时请自担风险。

trans-unit.source: Using this option, you can tell Mariabackup to compress its backup files before writing them to disk. You may find this useful when backing up particularly large databases.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项,您可以告诉Mariabackup在将备份文件写入磁盘前对其进行压缩。您可能会发现这在备份特别大的数据库时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Using this variant the first (#0) csv source column is mapped to the target ColumnStore column with the name id, and the fifth source csv column (#4) is mapped to the target ColumnStore column with the name salary. It further defines that the target ColumnStore column timestamp uses a default value of 2018-09-13 12:00:00 for the injection.
trans-unit.target: 使用该变型中，第一（＃0）的csv源列被映射到与该名称的目标列存储列ID，和第五源CSV柱（＃4）被映射到与该名称的目标列存储列薪水。它进一步定义目标ColumnStore列时间戳使用默认值2018-09-13 12:00:00进行注入。

trans-unit.source: Using time periods implicitly defines the two columns as NOT NULL. It also adds a constraint to check whether the first value is less than the second value. The constraint is invisible to SHOW CREATE TABLE statements. The name of this constraint is prefixed by the time period name, to avoid conflict with other constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用时间段将这两列隐式定义为 NOT NULL 。它还添加了一个约束来检查第一个值是否小于第二个值。该约束对于 SHOW CREATE TABLE 语句不可见。该约束的名称以时间段名称为前缀，以避免与其他约束发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Using two --verbose options will also give you connection information.
trans-unit.target: 使用两个 --verbose 选项还将为您提供连接信息。

trans-unit.source: Using unix_socket means that if you are the system root user, you can login as root@locahost without a password. This technique was pioneered by Otto Kekäläinen in Debian MariaDB packages and has been successfully used in Debian since as early as MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 使用unix_socket意味着，如果您是系统root用户，则可以不使用密码以root @ locahost身份登录。该技术由OttoKekäläinen在Debian MariaDB软件包中率先提出，自从MariaDB 10.0以来就已在Debian中成功使用。

trans-unit.target: 使用虚拟列

trans-unit.source: Usually a file in the data directory, but some distributions may move this to other locations.
trans-unit.target: 通常是数据目录中的一个文件,但有些发行版可能会将其移到其他位置。

trans-unit.source: Usually the pam authentication plugin uses the dialog client authentication plugin to communicate with the user. This client authentication plugin allows MariaDB to support arbitrarily complex PAM configurations with regular or one-time passwords, challenge-response, multiple questions, or just about anything else. When using a MariaDB client library, there is no need to install or enable anything — the dialog client authentication plugin is loaded by the client library completely automatically and transparently for the application.
trans-unit.target: 通常， pam 身份验证插件使用 dialog 客户端身份验证插件与用户通信。此客户端身份验证插件使MariaDB可以使用常规或一次性密码，质询响应，多个问题或几乎其他任何内容来支持任意复杂的PAM配置。使用MariaDB客户端库时，无需安装或启用任何内容- dialog 客户端身份验证插件由客户端库完全为应用程序自动透明地加载。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the slave_parallel_threads system variable should be set large enough that the SQL thread is able to read far enough ahead in the binary log to exploit all possible parallelism. In normal operation, the slave will hopefully not be too far behind, so there will not be a need to queue much data in-memory. The slave_parallel_max_queued system variable could be set fairly high (eg. a few hundred kilobytes) to not limit throughtput. It should just be set low enough that total allocation of the parallel slave queue will not cause the server to run out of memory.
trans-unit.target: 通常， slave_parallel_threads 系统变量应设置得足够大，以使SQL线程能够在二进制日志中提前读取足够远的距离，以利用所有可能的并行性。希望在正常操作中，从站不会落后太远，因此无需在内存中排队太多数据。可以将 slave_parallel_max_queued 系统变量设置得很高（例如几百千字节），以不限制吞吐量。它应该设置得足够低，以使并行从属队列的总分配不会导致服务器内存不足。

trans-unit.target: 用于监控查询及其性能的实用程序和命令。

trans-unit.source: VARCHAR columns can be fully indexed. TEXT columns can only be indexed over a specified length.
trans-unit.target: VARCHAR列可以完全索引。TEXT列只能在指定的长度上建立索引。

trans-unit.source: VARCHAR is shorthand for CHARACTER VARYING. NATIONAL VARCHAR is the standard SQL way to define that a VARCHAR column should use some predefined character set. MariaDB uses utf8 as this predefined character set, as does MySQL 4.1 and up. NVARCHAR is shorthand for NATIONAL VARCHAR.
trans-unit.target: VARCHAR是CHARACTER VARYING的缩写。NATIONAL VARCHAR是标准的SQL方式,定义一个VARCHAR列应该使用一些预定义的字符集。MariaDB使用utf8作为这个预定义字符集,MySQL 4.1及以上版本也是如此。NVARCHAR是NATIONAL VARCHAR的简写。

trans-unit.source: VARCHAR(0) columns can contain 2 values: an empty string or NULL. Such columns cannot be part of an index. The CONNECT storage engine does not support VARCHAR(0).
trans-unit.target: VARCHAR（0）列可以包含2个值：空字符串或NULL。这样的列不能是索引的一部分。该CONNECT存储引擎不支持VARCHAR（0）。

trans-unit.target: xtstat 显示的值可以是时间（以毫秒为单位），值（以字节为单位）或计数器。如果这些值太大而无法显示，则将值四舍五入并添加一个大小指示器。

trans-unit.source: Values for PERSISTENT generated columns are generated whenever a DML queries inserts or updates the row with the special DEFAULT value. This generates the columns value, and it is stored in the table like the other "real" columns. This value can be read by other DML queries just like the other "real" columns.
trans-unit.target: 对于价值 PERSISTENT 每当产生生成列DML查询插入或用特殊更新该行 DEFAULT 值。这将生成列值，并像其他“真实”列一样存储在表中。就像其他“真实”列一样，其他DML查询也可以读取该值。

trans-unit.source: Values for VIRTUAL generated columns are not stored in the table. Instead, the value is generated dynamically whenever the column is queried. If other columns in a row are queried, but the VIRTUAL generated column is not one of the queried columns, then the column's value is not generated.
trans-unit.target: VIRTUAL 生成的列的值未存储在表中。取而代之的是，每当查询该列时，该值就会动态生成。如果查询了行中的其他列，但 VIRTUAL 生成的列不是查询的列之一，则不会生成该列的值。

trans-unit.source: Values for all columns are taken from the values specified in the REPLACE statement. Any missing columns are set to their default values, just as happens for INSERT. You cannot refer to values from the current row and use them in the new row. If you use an assignment such as 'SET col = col + 1', the reference to the column name on the right hand side is treated as DEFAULT(col), so the assignment is equivalent to 'SET col = DEFAULT(col) + 1'.
trans-unit.target: 所有列的值均取自 REPLACE 语句中指定的值。就像 INSERT 一样，所有缺少的列均设置为其默认值。您不能引用当前行中的值，也不能在新行中使用它们。如果您使用诸如 'SET col = col + 1' 类的赋值，则对右侧列名的引用将被视为 DEFAULT(col) ，因此该赋值等效于 'SET col = DEFAULT(col) + 1' 。

trans-unit.source: Values missing from 'searchable fields' would need to be NULL (or whatever), and the code would need to deal with such.

trans-unit.source: Versions of MySQL and MariaDB which do not have support for this optimization will execute subqueries even when running EXPLAIN. This can result in a well-known problem (see e.g. MySQL Bug #44802) of EXPLAIN statements taking a very long time. Starting from MariaDB 5.3+ and MySQL 5.6+ EXPLAIN commands execute instantly, regardless of the derived_merge setting.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此优化的MySQL和MariaDB版本即使在运行 EXPLAIN 时也会执行子查询。这可能会导致 EXPLAIN 语句的一个众所周知的问题（例如，参见MySQL Bug＃44802）花费很长时间。从MariaDB 5.3 +和MySQL 5.6+开始， EXPLAIN 命令会立即执行，而不管 derived_merge 设置如何。

trans-unit.source: Views and Subqueries
trans-unit.target: 视图和子查询

trans-unit.source: Views are stored queries that act as a virtual table.
trans-unit.target: 视图是作为虚拟表的存储查询。

trans-unit.source: Views can be used for inserting or updating with certain limitations.
trans-unit.target: 视图可以用于插入或更新,有一定的限制。

trans-unit.source: Views must have unique column names with no duplicates, just like base tables. By default, the names of the columns retrieved by the SELECT statement are used for the view column names. To define explicit names for the view columns, the optional column_list clause can be given as a list of comma-separated identifiers. The number of names in column_list must be the same as the number of columns retrieved by the SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 视图必须有唯一的列名,不能重复,就像基表一样。默认情况下,视图列名使用SELECT语句检索到的列名。要为视图列定义显式名称,可以将可选的column_list子句给出一个逗号分隔的标识符列表。column_list子句中名称的数量必须与SELECT语句检索到的列的数量相同。

trans-unit.source: Views with definition ALGORITHM=MERGE or ALGORITHM=TEMPTABLE got accidentally swapped between MariaDB and MySQL. You have to re-create views created with either of these definitions (see MDEV-6916).
trans-unit.target: 定义为 ALGORITHM=MERGE 或 ALGORITHM=TEMPTABLE 的视图在MariaDB和MySQL之间意外交换。您必须重新创建使用这些定义之一创建的视图（请参阅MDEV-6916）。

trans-unit.source: We have seen that json files can be formatted differently depending on the pretty option. In particular, big data files should be formatted with pretty equal to 0 when used by a CONNECT json table. The best and simplest way to convert a file from one format to another is to use the Jfile_Make function. Indeed this function makes a file of specified format using the syntax:
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到json文件可以根据pretty选项的不同格式设置。特别是，当由CONNECT json表使用时，大数据文件的格式应等于0。将文件从一种格式转换为另一种格式的最佳，最简单的方法是使用Jfile_Make函数。实际上，此函数使用以下语法生成指定格式的文件：

trans-unit.source: We have seen that many json UDFs can have an additional argument not yet described. This is in the case where the json item argument was referring to a file. Then the additional integer argument is the pretty value of the json file. It matters only when the first argument is just a file name (to make the UDF understand this argument is a file name, it should be aliased with a name beginning with jfile_) or if the function modifies the file, in which case it will be rewritten with this pretty format.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到,许多json UDF可以有一个额外的参数尚未描述。这是在json项参数是指一个文件的情况下。那么额外的整数参数就是json文件的漂亮值。只有当第一个参数只是一个文件名的时候,才有关系(为了让UDF明白这个参数是一个文件名,应该用jfile_开头的名字来别名),或者是函数修改了文件,在这种情况下,就会用这个漂亮格式重写。

trans-unit.source: We have seen that the most natural way to represent a table in a JSON file is to make it on an array of objects. However, other possibilities exist. A table can be an array of arrays, a one column table can be an array of values, or a one row table can be just one object or one value. One row tables are internally handled by adding a one value array around them.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到,在JSON文件中表示一个表的最自然的方式是使它在一个对象数组上。然而,还存在其他的可能性。一个表可以是一个数组,一个一列表可以是一个值数组,或者一个一列表可以只是一个对象或一个值。一行表的内部处理方法是在其周围添加一个一值数组。

trans-unit.source: We install the binary with a symlink to the original name. This is done so that you can easily change MariaDB versions just by moving the symlink to point to another directory.
trans-unit.target: 我们在安装二进制文件的时候,会有一个指向原始名称的符号链接。这样做的目的是为了让你可以很容易地改变MariaDB的版本,只需将符号链接移动到另一个目录。

trans-unit.source: We know of three scenarios when dependencies were broken. The steps to fix each of them are pretty much the same, only the list of broken dependencies and hence the list of packages to take care of them differs. The basic idea is to downgrade those certain packages to 5.5.32 temporarily before upgrading them to 5.5.33a.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道有三种情况下,依赖关系被破坏。每种情况的修复步骤都大同小异,只是被破坏的依赖关系列表和需要处理的软件包列表有所不同。基本的思路是将这些某些包暂时降级到5.5.32,然后再升级到5.5.33a。

trans-unit.source: What about autocommit = 1? wsrep_retry_autocommit tells Galera to retry if a single statement that is autocommited N times. So, there is still a chance (very slim) of getting a deadlock on such a statement. The default setting of "1" retry is probably good.
trans-unit.target: 那autocommit=1呢? wsrep_retry_autocommit告诉Galera,如果一个单条语句,被autocommit了N次,就重试。所以,这样的语句还是有机会(非常小)出现死锁的。默认设置为 "1 "次重试可能是好的。

trans-unit.source: What he describes is known as MED (Management of External Data) enabling the handling of data not stored in a DBMS database as if it were stored in tables. An ISO standard exists that describes one way to implement and use MED in SQL by defining foreign tables for which an external FDW (Foreign Data Wrapper) has been developed in C.

trans-unit.source: What if you are looking for Starbucks in a dense city? There would be dozens, maybe hundreds per square mile. If you start the guess at 100 miles, the SELECTs would be hitting lots of blocks -- not efficient. In this case, the "starting distance" should be small, say, 2 miles. Let's say your app wants the closest 10 stores. In this example, you would probably find more than 10 Starbucks within 2 miles in 1 InnoDB block in one partition. Even though there is a second SELECT to finish off the query, it would be hitting the same block. Total: One block hit == cheap.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要在一个密集的城市里找星巴克呢?每平方英里会有几十家,也许是几百家。如果你从100英里开始猜测,selects会打到很多街区--效率不高。在这种情况下,"起始距离 "应该很小,比如说,2英里。比方说,你的应用想要最近的10家商店。在这个例子中,你可能会在一个分区的1个InnoDB块中找到2英里内的10多家星巴克。即使有第二个SELECT来完成查询,也会打到同一个区块。总的来说。一个区块命中==便宜。

trans-unit.source: What must be understood here is that the Update modifies node values in the XML file, not cell values in the relational table. The first update worked normally. The second update changed the year value of the book and this shows for the two expanded rows because there is only one DATEPUB node for that book. Because the third update applies to a row having a certain date value, both author names were updated.
trans-unit.target: 这里必须理解的是,更新修改的是XML文件中的节点值,而不是关系表中的单元格值。第一次更新正常工作。第二次更新改变了该书的年份值,这对两个扩展行来说是有显示的,因为该书只有一个DATEPUB节点。因为第三次更新适用于具有某个日期值的行,所以两个作者名都被更新了。

trans-unit.source: When GTID strict mode is enabled (by setting @@GLOBAL.gtid_strict_mode to 1), it is normally best to use current_pos. In strict mode, extra transactions on the master are disallowed.
trans-unit.target: 当GTID严格模式被使能（通过设置 @@GLOBAL.gtid_strict_mode 至1）中，通常最好是使用 current_pos 。在严格模式下，不允许在主服务器上进行额外的事务。

trans-unit.source: When encrypting Aria tables, the key that is used to encrypt tables cannot currently be changed.
trans-unit.target: 当加密晓月表，用来加密表的关键，目前无法改变。

trans-unit.source: When compiling MariaDB from source, the AWS Key Management plugin is not built by default in MariaDB 10.1, but it is built by default in MariaDB 10.2 and later, on systems that support it.
trans-unit.target: 当从源代码编译MariaDB的，AWS的密钥管理插件默认情况下不建MariaDB的10.1，但默认情况下，在建MariaDB的10.2及更高版本，支持它的系统。

trans-unit.source: When rotating encryption keys, InnoDB's background encryption threads re-encrypt pages that use key versions older than innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age to the new key version.
trans-unit.target: 当旋转的加密密钥，InnoDB的背景加密线程重新加密使用比老版本的关键页面 innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age 新的密钥版本。

trans-unit.source: When encrypting InnoDB tables, the key that is used to encrypt tables can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 当加密InnoDB表，即用于加密表中的键是可以改变的。

trans-unit.source: When multi-source replication is in use, each independent replication connection has its own slave threads of each type.
trans-unit.target: 使用多源复制时，每个独立的复制连接都有其自己的每种类型的从属线程。

trans-unit.source: When parallel replication is in use, then the SQL thread hands off the events to its worker threads to apply in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 使用并行复制时，SQL线程会将事件移交给其工作线程以并行应用。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB replication is used with MariaDB Galera Cluster, see Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Setting server_id on Cluster Nodes for more information on how to set the server_id values.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera Cluster一起使用时，请参阅将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera Cluster一起使用：在群集节点上设置server_id，以获取有关如何设置 server_id 值的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB replication is used with standalone MariaDB Server, each server in the replication topology must have a unique server_id value.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB复制与独立的MariaDB服务器一起使用时，复制拓扑中的每个服务器都必须具有唯一的 server_id 值。

trans-unit.source: When semisynchronous replication is enabled, semisynchronous slaves send acknowledgements (ACKs) to their master confirm that they have received some transaction. The master creates an ACK receiver thread to receive these ACKs.
trans-unit.target: 当半同步复制启用，半同步发送的奴隶，他们已经收到了一些交易确认（ACK），他们的主人确认。主机创建一个ACK接收器线程以接收这些ACK。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_autoinc_lock_mode is set to 0, InnoDB uses the traditional lock mode.
trans-unit.target: 当innodb_autoinc_lock_mode设置为 0 时，InnoDB使用传统的锁定模式。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_autoinc_lock_mode is set to 1, InnoDB uses the consecutive lock mode.
trans-unit.target: 当innodb_autoinc_lock_mode设置为 1 时，InnoDB使用连续锁定模式。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_autoinc_lock_mode is set to 2, InnoDB uses the interleaved lock mode.
trans-unit.target: 当innodb_autoinc_lock_mode设置为 2 时，InnoDB使用交错锁定模式。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_file_per_table is set, the #sql-*.ibd file will also be visible in the database directory.
trans-unit.target: 当innodb_file_per_table设置，在 #sql-*.ibd 文件也将在数据库目录中可见。

trans-unit.source: When wsrep_gtid_mode is set to OFF, wsrep_gtid_domain_id is simply ignored to allow for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 当 wsrep_gtid_mode 设置为 OFF 时， wsrep_gtid_domain_id 忽略wsrep_gtid_domain_id，以实现向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: When wsrep_gtid_mode is set to ON, wsrep_gtid_domain_id is used in place of gtid_domain_id for all Galera Cluster write sets.
trans-unit.target: 当 wsrep_gtid_mode 设置为 ON ， wsrep_gtid_domain_id 被用来代替 gtid_domain_id 所有加莱拉集群写入设置。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_encrypt_tables is set to FORCE, InnoDB tables are automatically encrypted by default, and unencrypted InnoDB tables can not be created. In this scenario, if you set the ENCRYPTED table option to NO for a table, then you will encounter an error. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb_encrypt_tables 设置为 FORCE 时，默认情况下将自动加密InnoDB表，并且无法创建未加密的InnoDB表。在这种情况下，如果将一个表的 ENCRYPTED table选项设置为 NO ，则将遇到错误。例如：

trans-unit.source: When innodb_encrypt_tables is set to ON or FORCE, then you must ensure that innodb_encryption_threads is set to a non-zero value, so that InnoDB can perform any necessary encryption operations in the background. See background operations for more information about that. innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age must also be set to a non-zero value for the initial encryption operations to happen in the background. See disabling key rotations for more information about that.
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb_encrypt_tables 设置为 ON 或 FORCE 时，则必须确保将 innodb_encryption_threads 设置为非零值，以便InnoDB可以在后台执行任何必要的加密操作。有关更多信息，请参见后台操作。 innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age 必须将innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age设置为非零值，以便在后台进行初始加密操作。有关更多信息，请参见禁用键旋转。

trans-unit.source: When innodb_encrypt_tables is set to ON, InnoDB tables are automatically encrypted by default. For example, the following statements create an encrypted table and confirm that it is encrypted:
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb_encrypt_tables 设置为 ON 时，默认情况下会自动加密InnoDB表。例如，以下语句创建一个加密表并确认它已加密：

trans-unit.source: When innodb_encrypt_tables is set to ON, an unencrypted InnoDB table can be created by setting the ENCRYPTED table option to NO for the table. For example, the following statements create an unencrypted table and confirm that it is not encrypted:
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb_encrypt_tables 设置为 ON 时，可以通过将表的 ENCRYPTED table选项设置为 NO 来创建未加密的InnoDB 表。例如，以下语句创建一个未加密的表并确认未加密的表：

trans-unit.source: When innodb_file_per_table=ON is set, InnoDB uses one tablespace file per InnoDB table. These tablespace files have the .ibd extension. When innodb_file_per_table=OFF is set, InnoDB stores all tables in the InnoDB system tablespace.
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb_file_per_table=ON 设置，InnoDB使用每InnoDB表一个表文件。这些表空间文件的扩展名为 .ibd 。当 innodb_file_per_table=OFF 被设定时，InnoDB存储在所有表的InnoDB系统表。

trans-unit.source: When ALGORITHM=COPY is set, MariaDB essentially does the following operations:
trans-unit.target: 当 ALGORITHM=COPY 设置，MariaDB的主要执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: When ALGORITHM=INPLACE is set, the underlying storage engine uses optimizations to perform the operation while avoiding the table copy and rebuild. However, INPLACE is a bit of a misnomer, since some operations may still require the table to be rebuilt for some storage engines. Regardless, several operations can be performed without a full copy of the table for some storage engines.
trans-unit.target: 当 ALGORITHM=INPLACE 被设置，同时避免了表副本底层存储引擎用途优化，以执行操作和重建。但是， INPLACE 有点用词不当，因为某些操作可能仍需要为某些存储引擎重建该表。无论如何，对于某些存储引擎，可以在没有表的完整副本的情况下执行多种操作。

trans-unit.source: When EXTRACTVALUE() returns multiple matches, it returns the content of the first child text node of each matching element, in the matched order, as a single, space-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: 当 EXTRACTVALUE() 返回多个匹配项时，它以匹配的顺序作为单个空格分隔的字符串返回每个匹配元素的第一个子文本节点的内容。

trans-unit.source: When IF EXISTS and IF NOT EXISTS are used in clauses, queries will not report errors when the condition is triggered for that clause. A warning with the same message text will be issued and the ALTER will move on to the next clause in the statement (or end if finished).
trans-unit.target: 当 IF EXISTS 和 IF NOT EXISTS 在子句中使用，当条件被触发该子句的查询不会报告错误。将发出一条带有相同消息文本的警告，并且ALTER将继续执行该语句中的下一个子句（如果完成，则结束）。

trans-unit.source: When LOCK IN SHARE MODE is specified in a SELECT statement, MariaDB will wait until all transactions that have modified the rows are committed. Then, a write lock is acquired. All transactions can read the rows, but if they want to modify them, they have to wait until your transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 当在SELECT语句中指定 LOCK IN SHARE MODE 时，MariaDB将等待，直到所有修改了行的事务都提交为止。然后，获取写锁定。所有事务都可以读取行，但是如果要修改它们，则必须等到事务提交后再行。

trans-unit.source: When conn1 runs through the INSERT statement, it hits the sync point 'after_open_tables'. It notices that it is active and executes its action. It emits the signal 'opened' and waits for another thread to emit the signal 'flushed'.
trans-unit.target: 当 conn1 通过 INSERT 语句运行时，它将到达同步点 'after_open_tables' 。它注意到它处于活动状态并执行其动作。它发出信号 'opened' 并等待另一个线程发出信号 'flushed' 。

trans-unit.source: When conn2 reaches 'after_abort_locks', it signals 'flushed', which lets conn1 awake.
trans-unit.target: 当 conn2 到达 'after_abort_locks' 时，它发出 'flushed' 信号，这使 conn1 醒来。

trans-unit.source: When log_bin_trust_function_creators is OFF and log_bin is ON, CREATE FUNCTION and ALTER FUNCTION statements will trigger an error if the function is defined with any of the NOT DETERMINISTIC, CONTAINS SQL or MODIFIES SQL DATA characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 当 log_bin_trust_function_creators 为 OFF 且 log_bin 为 ON 时，如果使用 NOT DETERMINISTIC ， CONTAINS SQL 或 MODIFIES SQL DATA 特征之一定义函数，则 CREATE FUNCTION 和 ALTER FUNCTION 语句将触发错误。

trans-unit.source: When log_bin_trust_function_creators is OFF and log_bin is ON, the SUPER privilege is also required to execute the following statements:
trans-unit.target: 当 log_bin_trust_function_creators 为 OFF 且 log_bin 为 ON 时，还需要 SUPER 特权才能执行以下语句：

trans-unit.source: When mysqld_safe starts mysqld, it also uses this option to set the value of the open_files_limit system variable for mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 当 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld 时，它也使用该选项设置 mysqld 的 open_files_limit 系统变量的值。

trans-unit.source: When wsrep_gtid_mode is set to OFF, wsrep_gtid_domain_id is simply ignored to allow for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 当 wsrep_gtid_mode 设置为 OFF 时， wsrep_gtid_domain_id 忽略wsrep_gtid_domain_id，以实现向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: When wsrep_gtid_mode is set to ON, wsrep_gtid_domain_id is used in place of gtid_domain_id for all Galera Cluster write sets.
trans-unit.target: 当 wsrep_gtid_mode 设置为 ON ， wsrep_gtid_domain_id 被用来代替 gtid_domain_id 所有加莱拉集群写入设置。

trans-unit.source: When @@GLOBAL.ENFORCE_GTID_CONSISTENCY = 1, the statements CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE and DROP TEMPORARY TABLE can be executed in a non-transactional context only, and require that AUTOCOMMIT = 1.
trans-unit.target: 当@@GLOBAL.ENFORCE_GTID_CONSISTENCY=1时,语句CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE和DROP TEMPORARY TABLE只能在非事务性上下文中执行,并且要求AUTOCOMMIT=1。

trans-unit.source: When @@GLOBAL.ENFORCE_GTID_CONSISTENCY = 1, updates to non-transactional tables can only be done in either autocommitted statements or single-statement transactions, and never in the same statement as updates to transactional tables.
trans-unit.target: 当@@GLOBAL.ENFORCE_GTID_CONSISTENCY=1时,对非事务表的更新只能在自动提交的语句或单语句事务中进行,决不能与事务表的更新在同一语句中进行。

trans-unit.source: When @@SESSION.GTID_NEXT is set to a GTID, you must explicitly set it to a different value after a COMMIT or ROLLBACK. Please check GTID_NEXT variable manual page for detailed explanation. Current @@SESSION.GTID_NEXT is '%s'.
trans-unit.target: 当@@SESSION.GTID_NEXT被设置为GTID时,必须在COMMIT或ROLLBACK后明确地将其设置为不同的值。详细的说明请查看GTID_NEXT变量手册页。当前@@SESSION.GTID_NEXT是'%s'。

trans-unit.target: 当调用一个过程时

trans-unit.source: When CMake runs through the tests again, it should now find the packages it needs, instead of the cache telling it they're unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 当CMake再次运行测试时,它现在应该能找到它需要的包,而不是缓存告诉它它们不可用。

trans-unit.source: When Does Encryption Help to Protect Your Data?
trans-unit.target: 加密何时有助于保护您的数据?

trans-unit.source: When FETCH is issued and there are no more rows to extract, the following error is produced:
trans-unit.target: 当发出FETCH后,没有更多的行可以提取,会产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: When GTID strict mode is enabled, some additional errors are enabled for situations that could otherwise cause differences between binlogs on different servers in a replication hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 当GTID严格模式被启用时,一些额外的错误被启用,否则可能导致复制层次结构中不同服务器上的binlogs之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: When GTID strict mode is enabled, the slave will stop with an error when a problem is encountered. This allows the DBA to become aware of the problem and take corrective actions to avoid similar issues in the future. One way to recover from such an error is to temporarily disable GTID strict mode on the offending slave, to be able to replicate past the problem point (perhaps using START SLAVE UNTIL master_gtid_pos=XXX).
trans-unit.target: 启用GTID严格模式后，从站将在遇到问题时停止并显示错误。这使DBA能够意识到问题并采取纠正措施以避免将来出现类似问题。从此类错误中恢复的一种方法是临时在有问题的从属服务器上禁用GTID严格模式，以便能够复制到问题点之后（也许使用 START SLAVE UNTIL master_gtid_pos=XXX ）。

trans-unit.source: When Galera is enabled, MariaDB's systemd service automatically runs the galera_recovery script prior to starting MariaDB, so that MariaDB starts with the proper Galera position.
trans-unit.target: 启用Galera后，MariaDB的 systemd 服务会在启动MariaDB之前自动运行 galera_recovery 脚本，以便MariaDB从正确的Galera位置开始。

trans-unit.source: When HWM is 0 the DATA_SIZE will show 0 instead of 8192 to avoid confusion when there is multiple segments in an extent file
trans-unit.target: 当HWM为0时,DATA_SIZE将显示为0,而不是8192,以避免在一个范围文件中有多个段时发生混淆。

trans-unit.source: When Index Condition Pushdown is used, EXPLAIN will show "Using index condition":
trans-unit.target: 当使用索引条件下推时,EXPLAIN将显示 "使用索引条件"。

trans-unit.source: When InnoDB needs to store general information relating to the system as a whole, rather than a specific table, the specific file it writes to is the system tablespace. By default, this is the ibdata1 file located in the data directory, (as defined by either the datadir or innodb_data_home_dir system variables). InnoDB uses the system tablespace to store the data dictionary, change buffer, and undo logs.
trans-unit.target: 当InnoDB需要存储与整个系统有关的常规信息，而不是特定表时，它写入的特定文件就是系统表空间。缺省情况下，这是位于数据目录中的 ibdata1 文件（由 datadir 或 innodb_data_home_dir 系统变量定义）。 InnoDB使用系统表空间来存储数据字典，更改缓冲区和撤消日志。

trans-unit.source: When InnoDB page compression is used, InnoDB may still write the compressed page to the tablespace file with the original size of the uncompressed page, which would be equivalent to the value of the innodb_page_size system variable. This is done by design, because when InnoDB's I/O code needs to read the page from disk, it can only read the full page size. However, this is obviously not optimal.
trans-unit.target: 当使用InnoDB页面压缩时，InnoDB仍会以未压缩页面的原始大小将压缩后的页面写入表空间文件，该大小等于 innodb_page_size 系统变量的值。这是设计完成的，因为当InnoDB的I / O代码需要从磁盘读取页面时，它只能读取整个页面大小。但是，这显然不是最佳的。

trans-unit.source: When InnoDB performs a checkpoint, it writes the LSN of the oldest dirty page in the InnoDB buffer pool to the InnoDB redo log. If a page is the oldest dirty page in the InnoDB buffer pool, then that means that all pages with lower LSNs have been flushed to the physical InnoDB tablespace files. If the server were to crash, then InnoDB would perform crash recovery by only applying log records with LSNs that are greater than or equal to the LSN of the oldest dirty page written in the last checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB执行检查点时，会将InnoDB缓冲池中最旧的脏页的LSN写入InnoDB重做日志。如果页面是InnoDB缓冲池中最旧的脏页面，则意味着所有具有较低LSN的页面都已刷新到物理InnoDB表空间文件。如果服务器崩溃，那么InnoDB将仅通过应用LSN大于或等于最后一个检查点中写入的最早脏页的LSN的日志记录来执行崩溃恢复。

trans-unit.source: When Innodb writes to the filesystem, there is generally no guarantee that a given write operation will be complete (not partial) in cases of a poweroff event, or if the operating system crashes at the exact moment a write is being done.
trans-unit.target: 当Innodb向文件系统写入时,通常不能保证在断电事件的情况下,或者操作系统在写入的确切时刻崩溃时,给定的写入操作会完成(而不是部分)。

trans-unit.source: When MRR is used for range access, the size of its buffer is controlled by the mrr_buffer_size system variable. Its value specifies how much space can be used for each table. For example, if there is a query which is a 10-way join and MRR is used for each table, 10*@@mrr_buffer_size bytes may be used.
trans-unit.target: 当MRR用于 range 访问时，其缓冲区的大小由mrr_buffer_size系统变量控制。它的值指定每个表可以使用多少空间。例如，如果存在一个10路 10*@@mrr_buffer_size 的查询，并且每个表都使用MRR，则可以使用10 * @@ mrr_buffer_size字节。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB Platform X3 is deployed for HTAP, web and mobile services send queries to MariaDB MaxScale. In turn, MaxScale distributes these queries according to their purpose, transactional queries are sent to MariaDB Servers for OLTP workloads, and analytical queries are sent to MariaDB ColumnStore for OLAP operations.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB Platform X3被部署为HTAP时,Web和移动服务会将查询发送到MariaDB MaxScale。而MaxScale则根据这些查询的目的进行分发,事务性查询被发送到MariaDB服务器进行OLTP工作负载,分析性查询被发送到MariaDB ColumnStore进行OLAP操作。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB Server creates a new instance, it prints a message like the following to the error log:
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB Server创建新实例时，它将在错误日志中输出如下消息：

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB Server is compiled with TLS and cryptography support, it is usually either statically linked with MariaDB's bundled TLS and cryptography library or dynamically linked with the system's OpenSSL library. MariaDB's bundled TLS library is either wolfSSL or yaSSL, depending on the server version.
trans-unit.target: 当使用TLS和加密支持编译MariaDB Server时，通常将其与MariaDB捆绑的TLS和加密库静态链接，或与系统的OpenSSL库动态链接。MariaDB的捆绑TLS库是wolfSSL或yaSSL，具体取决于服务器版本。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB Servers run as replication slaves, they replicate data through client connections with the master server. In order for these servers to establish client connections, create a replication user on the master server, Server-1, and grant the user the relevant privileges to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB服务器作为复制从属服务器运行时，它们通过与主服务器的客户端连接复制数据。为了使这些服务器建立客户端连接，请在主服务器 Server-1 上创建一个复制用户，并向该用户授予相关权限以检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB executes a DELETE FOR PORTION statement, it removes the row:
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB执行 DELETE FOR PORTION 语句时，它将删除该行：

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB executes the ALTER TABLE statement, it converts the data from the older temporal format to the newer one.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB执行 ALTER TABLE 语句时，它将数据从较旧的时间格式转换为较新的时间格式。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB is compiled with TLS and cryptography support, it is usually either statically linked with MariaDB's bundled TLS and cryptography library, which might be wolfSSL or yaSSL, or dynamically linked with the system's TLS and cryptography library, which might be OpenSSL, GnuTLS, or Schannel.
trans-unit.target: 当使用TLS和加密技术支持对MariaDB进行编译时，通常将其与MariaDB捆绑的TLS和加密技术库（可能是wolfSSL或yaSSL）静态链接，或者与系统的TLS和加密技术库（可能是OpenSSL，GnuTLS或Schannel。

trans-unit.source: When MariaDB is started with the systemd unit file, it directly starts the mysqld process as the mysql user. Unlike with sysVinit, the mysqld process is not started with mysqld_safe. As a consequence, options will not be read from the [mysqld_safe]option group from option files.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 systemd 单位文件启动MariaDB时，它将以 mysql 用户身份直接启动 mysqld 进程。与 sysVinit 不同， mysqld 进程不是使用 mysqld_safe 启动的。结果，将不会从选项文件的 [mysqld_safe] 选项组中读取选项。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup encounters a query that sets a global lock, it can kill the query in order to free up MariaDB Server for the backup. Using this option, you can choose the types of query it kills: SELECT, UPDATE, or both set with ALL. The default is ALL.
trans-unit.target: 当Mariabackup遇到设置全局锁定的查询时，它可以终止该查询，以释放MariaDB Server进行备份。使用此选项，您可以选择终止的查询类型： SELECT ， UPDATE 或同时使用 ALL 设置的查询。默认值为 ALL 。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup restores a database, it preserves the file and directory privileges of the backup. However, it writes the files to disk as the user and group restoring the database. As such, after restoring a backup, you may need to adjust the owner of the data directory to match the user and group for the MariaDB Server, typically mysql for both. For example, to recursively change ownership of the files to the mysql user and group, you could execute:
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup还原数据库时，将保留备份的文件和目录特权。但是，它将作为还原数据库的用户和组将文件写入磁盘。因此，还原备份后，您可能需要调整数据目录的所有者，以匹配MariaDB服务器的用户和组，通常两者都使用 mysql 。例如，要将文件的所有权递归更改为 mysql 用户和组，可以执行：

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup runs it connects to the specified MariaDB Server to get its backups. Using this option, you can define the database user uses for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当Mariabackup运行时,它会连接到指定的MariaDB服务器以获取其备份。使用这个选项,你可以定义数据库用户用于认证。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup runs, it issues a FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK statement. It then identifies blocking queries. Using this option you can set a timeout in seconds for these blocking queries. When the time runs out, Mariabackup kills the queries.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup运行时，将发出 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 的FLUSH TABLES。然后，它标识阻止查询。使用此选项，您可以为这些阻止查询设置超时（以秒为单位）。时间到时，Mariabackup将终止查询。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup runs, it issues a global lock to prevent data from changing during the backup process and ensure a consistent record. If it encounters statements still in the process of executing, it waits until they complete before setting the lock. Using this option, you can set the number of seconds it waits, to prevent long-running queries from blocking the backup process. The default value is 0, which indicates that Mariabackup does not wait for queries to complete.
trans-unit.target: 当Mariabackup运行时,它会发出一个全局锁,以防止数据在备份过程中发生变化,并确保记录的一致性。如果遇到仍在执行过程中的语句,它会等待它们完成后再设置锁。使用此选项,您可以设置它等待的秒数,以防止长时间运行的查询阻塞备份过程。默认值为 0,表示 Mariabackup 不等待查询完成。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup runs, it issues a global lock to prevent data from changing during the backup process and ensure a consistent record. If it encounters statements still in the process of executing, it waits until they complete before setting the lock. Using this option, you can set the threshold at which Mariabackup engages FTWRL. When it --ftwrl-wait-timeout is not 0 and a statement has run for at least the amount of time given this argument, Mariabackup waits until the statement completes or until the --ftwrl-wait-timeout expires before setting the global lock and starting the backup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup运行时，它将发出全局锁定，以防止数据在备份过程中发生更改并确保记录一致。如果遇到仍在执行过程中的语句，它将等待直到语句完成后再设置锁定。使用此选项，您可以设置Mariabackup接合FTWRL的阈值。当 --ftwrl-wait-timeout 不为0并且语句已运行至少给定此参数的时间时，Mariabackup将等待直到语句完成或 --ftwrl-wait-timeout 到期，然后再设置全局锁定并开始备份。

trans-unit.source: When Mariabackup runs, it issues a global lock to prevent data from changing during the backup process. When it encounters a statement in the process of executing, it waits until the statement is finished before issuing the global lock. Using this option, you can modify this default behavior to ensure that it waits only for certain query types, such as for SELECT and UPDATE statements.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup运行时，它将发出全局锁定，以防止在备份过程中更改数据。当它在执行过程中遇到一条语句时，它会等到该语句完成后再发出全局锁。使用此选项，您可以修改此默认行为，以确保它仅等待某些查询类型，例如 SELECT 和 UPDATE 语句。

trans-unit.source: When Multi Range Read is used by Batched Key Access, then buffer space is managed by BKA code, which will automatically provide a part of its buffer space to MRR. You can control the amount of space used by BKA by setting
trans-unit.target: 当Batched Key Access使用Multi Range Read时,缓冲空间由BKA代码管理,BKA会自动提供一部分缓冲空间给MRR。您可以通过设置以下方式来控制BKA使用的空间大小。

trans-unit.target: 当MySQL 5.1成为MySQL的生产版本时,Federated有更多的功能和增强,即:。

trans-unit.target: 当PREPARE与不支持的语句一起使用时,会产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: When QueryStats is enabled, the query statistics history is collected in the querystats table in the infinidb_querystats schema.
trans-unit.target: 启用QueryStats后,查询统计历史记录会被收集到infinidb_querystats模式中的querystats表中。

trans-unit.source: When SELECTing, UNCOMPRESS the blob. Decode the string into a hash. You are now ready to interrogate/display any of the extra fields.
trans-unit.target: 当SELECTING时,取消对blob的压缩。将字符串解码成哈希值。现在您已经准备好询问/显示任何额外的字段。

trans-unit.source: When SETing a variable
trans-unit.target: 设置变量时

trans-unit.source: When TLS is supported, check the have_openssl system variable to determine whether the server is using OpenSSL or MariaDB's bundled TLS library. See TLS and Cryptography Libraries Used by MariaDB for more information about which libraries are used on which platforms.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持TLS，请检查 have_openssl 系统变量以确定服务器是使用OpenSSL还是MariaDB的捆绑TLS库。有关在哪些平台上使用哪些库的更多信息，请参见MariaDB使用的TLS和密码学库。

trans-unit.source: When _any_ write happens on a table, _all_ entries in the QC for _that_ table are removed.
trans-unit.target: 当表上发生_任何_写入时,该表的QC中的_所有_条目都会被删除。

trans-unit.source: When a COMMIT (including implicit commits) or a ROLLBACK statement (with no TO clause) is performed, they act on the whole transaction, and all savepoints are removed.
trans-unit.target: 当执行COMMIT（包括隐式提交）或ROLLBACK语句（不包含TO子句）时，它们将作用于整个事务，并删除所有保存点。

trans-unit.source: When a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE command is issued, MariaDB will silently change a column specification in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: 当发出CREATE TABLE或ALTER TABLE命令时，在以下情况下，MariaDB将静默更改列规范：

trans-unit.source: When a background encryption thread starts rotating a tablespace, the field contains its current size. If key rotation is not enabled, then the value will be NULL.
trans-unit.target: 当后台加密线程开始旋转表空间时，该字段包含其当前大小。如果未启用键旋转，则该值为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: When a password validation plugin is enabled, MariaDB won't allow an account to be created if the password validation plugin says that the account's password is too weak. This creates a problem for accounts that authenticate with the pam authentication plugin, since MariaDB has no knowledge of the user's password. When a user tries to create an account that authenticates with the pam authentication plugin, the password validation plugin would throw an error, even with strict_password_validation=OFF set.
trans-unit.target: 当密码验证插件启用，MariaDB的将不允许如果密码验证插件说，该帐户的密码太弱要创建一个帐户。这 pam 使用pam身份验证插件进行身份验证的帐户造成问题，因为MariaDB不知道用户的密码。当用户尝试创建使用 pam 身份验证插件进行身份验证的帐户时，即使设置了 strict_password_validation=OFF ，密码验证插件也会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: When a transaction writes data, it always inserts them in the table indexes or data (in the buffer pool or in physical files). No private copies are created. The old versions of data being modified by active XtraDB/InnoDB transactions are stored in the undo log. The original data can then be restored, or viewed by a consistent read.
trans-unit.target: 当事务写入数据时，它总是将它们插入表索引或数据中（在缓冲池或物理文件中）。没有创建私人副本。活动XtraDB / InnoDB事务正在修改的旧数据版本存储在撤消日志中。然后可以还原原始数据，或通过一致读取来查看原始数据。

trans-unit.source: When a file-per-table tablespaces and using ALTER TABLE to manually set the ENCRYPTED table option to YES, InnoDB does not use background threads to encrypt the tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 当一个文件的每个表的表空间和使用 ALTER TABLE 手动设置 ENCRYPTED 表选项 YES 时，InnoDB不会不使用后台线程的表空间进行加密。

trans-unit.source: When a DECLARE HANDLER block can handle more than one error condition, it may be useful to know which errors occurred. To do so, you can use the GET DIAGNOSTICS statement.
trans-unit.target: 当 DECLARE HANDLER 块可以处理多个错误情况时，了解发生了哪些错误可能很有用。为此，您可以使用GET DIAGNOSTICS语句。

trans-unit.source: When a TIME value is casted to a DATETIME, the date part will be 0000-00-00, not CURRENT_DATE (as dictated by the SQL standard)
trans-unit.target: 当 TIME 值强制转换为 DATETIME 时，日期部分将为 0000-00-00 ，而不是 CURRENT_DATE （由SQL标准规定）

trans-unit.source: When a MariaDB Root user password is configured, do the following to access the MariaDB console:
trans-unit.target: 当配置了MariaDB Root用户密码时,请执行以下操作来访问MariaDB控制台。

trans-unit.source: When a MariaDB client or client library is compiled with TLS and cryptography support, it is usually either statically linked with MariaDB's bundled TLS and cryptography library or dynamically linked with the system's TLS and cryptography library, which might be OpenSSL, GnuTLS, or Schannel.
trans-unit.target: 当使用TLS和加密支持编译MariaDB客户端或客户端库时，通常将其与MariaDB捆绑的TLS和密码库静态链接，或者与系统的TLS和密码库动态链接，该库可能是OpenSSL，GnuTLS或Schannel。

trans-unit.source: When a Multi Range Read scan makes an index lookup (or some other "basic" operation), the counter of the "basic" operation, e.g. Handler_read_key, will also be incremented. This way, you can still see total number of index accesses, including those made by MRR. Per-user/table/index statistics counters also include the row reads made by Multi Range Read scans.
trans-unit.target: 当“多范围读取”扫描进行索引查找（或其他一些“基本”操作）时，“基本”操作的计数器（例如Handler_read_key）也会增加。这样，您仍然可以看到索引访问的总数，包括MRR进行的访问。每用户/表/索引统计信息计数器还包括多范围读取扫描进行的行读取。

trans-unit.source: When a MySQL installation is upgraded to MySQL 5.1 or later from an older version,the server displays a name such as a-b-c (which is in the old format) as #mysql50#a-b-c, and you must refer to the name using the #mysql50# prefix. Use UPGRADE DATA DIRECTORY NAME in this case to explicitly tell the server to re-encode the database directory name to the current encoding format:
trans-unit.target: 当MySQL安装从旧版本升级到MySQL 5.1或更高版本时，服务器显示的名称如abc（采用旧格式）为＃mysql50＃abc，您必须使用＃mysql50＃引用该名称。字首。在这种情况下，请使用 UPGRADE DATA DIRECTORY NAME 明确告诉服务器将数据库目录名称重新编码为当前编码格式：

trans-unit.source: When a WHERE clause is related to the partitioning expression, the optimizer knows which partitions are relevant for the query. Other partitions will not be read. This optimization is called partition pruning.
trans-unit.target: 当WHERE子句与分区表达式相关时，优化器会知道哪些分区与查询相关。其他分区将不会被读取。这种优化称为分区修剪。

trans-unit.source: When a client uses INSERT DELAYED, it gets an okay from the server at once, and the row is queued to be inserted when the table is not in use by any other thread.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端使用 INSERT DELAYED 时，它会立即从服务器获得许可，并且当该表未被任何其他线程使用时，该行将排队插入。

trans-unit.source: When a cluster node's state, as seen by wsrep_local_state_comment, is JOINED, then increasing the number of slave threads may help the cluster node catch up with the cluster more quickly. In this case, it may be useful to set the number of threads to twice the number of CPUs on the system.
trans-unit.target: 如 wsrep_local_state_comment 所示，当集群节点的状态为 JOINED 时，则增加从属线程数可能有助于集群节点更快地追赶集群。在这种情况下，将线程数设置为系统上CPU数的两倍可能会很有用。

trans-unit.source: When a deadlock is detected the system uses a weighting algorithm to determine which thread in the deadlock should be killed and then kills it.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到死锁时,系统使用加权算法来确定死锁中的哪个线程应该被杀死,然后将其杀死。

trans-unit.source: When a generated column is PERSISTENT or indexed, the value of the expression needs to be consistent regardless of the SQL Mode flags in the current session. If it is not, then the table will be seen as corrupted when the value that should actually be returned by the computed expression and the value that was previously stored and/or indexed using a different sql_mode setting disagree.
trans-unit.target: 当生成的 PERSISTENT 或已索引时，无论当前会话中的 SQL Mode 标志如何，表达式的值都必须保持一致。如果不是，则当计算的表达式实际应返回的值与先前使用不同的 sql_mode 设置存储和/或索引的值不一致时，该表将被视为损坏。

trans-unit.source: When a join is very large and exceeds the PmMaxMemorySmallSide setting it is performed in memory in the UM server. For very large joins this could exceed the available memory in which case this is detected and a query error reported. A number of configuration parameters are available to enable and configure usage of disk overflow should this occur:
trans-unit.target: 当联接很大并且超过PmMaxMemorySmallSide设置时，它将在UM服务器的内存中执行。对于非常大的连接，这可能会超出可用内存，在这种情况下，将检测到该内存并报告查询错误。许多配置参数可用于在发生这种情况时启用和配置磁盘溢出的使用：

trans-unit.source: When a master server is shutdown and it goes through the normal shutdown process, the master kills client threads in random order. By default, the master also considers its binary log dump threads to be regular client threads. As a consequence, the binary log dump threads can be killed while client threads still exist, and this means that data can be written on the master during a normal shutdown that won't be replicated. This is true even if semi-synchronous replication is being used.
trans-unit.target: 当主服务器关闭并经历正常的关闭过程时，主服务器将以随机顺序杀死客户端线程。默认情况下，主服务器还将其二进制日志转储线程视为常规客户端线程。结果，可以在客户端线程仍然存在的同时杀死二进制日志转储线程，这意味着可以在正常关闭期间将数据写入主数据库，而不会被复制。即使使用半同步复制也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When a new client connection is created, its thread group is determined using the following calculation:
trans-unit.target: 当一个新的客户端连接被创建时,它的线程组是通过以下计算确定的。

trans-unit.source: When a node rejoins the cluster after being upgraded, it may have to perform a state transfer, such as an Incremental State Transfer (IST) or a State Snapshot Transfer(SST). It is recommended to ensure that the node's state transfer is complete before upgrading the next node in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 当节点在升级后重新加入群集时，它可能必须执行状态转移，例如增量状态转移（IST）或状态快照转移（SST）。建议在升级群集中的下一个节点之前，确保节点的状态传输已完成。

trans-unit.source: When a plugin is being installed, the server compares the plugin's maturity level against the server's minimum allowed plugin maturity. This can help prevent users from using unstable plugins on production servers. This minimum plugin maturity is configured by the plugin_maturity system variable. This can be specified as a command-line argument to mysqld or it can be specified in a relevant server option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 安装插件时，服务器会将插件的成熟度与服务器允许的最小插件成熟度进行比较。这可以帮助防止用户在生产服务器上使用不稳定的插件。最小插件成熟度由 plugin_maturity 系统变量配置。可以将其指定为 mysqld 的命令行参数，也可以在选项文件中的相关服务器选项组中指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: When a plugin is being installed, the server looks for the plugin's library in the server's plugin directory. This directory is configured by the plugin_dir system variable. This can be specified as a command-line argument to mysqld or it can be specified in a relevant server option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 安装插件时，服务器将在服务器的插件目录中查找插件的库。该目录由 plugin_dir 系统变量配置。可以将其指定为 mysqld 的命令行参数，也可以在选项文件中的相关服务器选项组中指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: When a row in the parent table is deleted and at least one child row exists, MariaDB performs an action which depends on the ON DELETE clause of the foreign key.
trans-unit.target: 当父表中的一行被删除并且至少有一个子行存在时，MariaDB将执行取决于外键的 ON DELETE 子句的操作。

trans-unit.source: When a scrubbing starts rotating a table space, the field contains its current size. NULL if not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当清理开始旋转表空间时，该字段包含其当前大小。如果未启用，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: When a slave connects to a master using old-style binlog positions, and the master supports GTID (ie. is MariaDB 10.0.2 or later), then the slave automatically downloads the GTID position at connect and updates it during replication. Thus, once a slave has connected to the GTID-aware master at least once, it can be switched to using GTID without any other actions needed;
trans-unit.target: 当从属服务器使用旧式binlog位置连接到主服务器，而主服务器支持GTID（即MariaDB 10.0.2或更高版本）时，从属服务器将自动在连接时下载GTID位置并在复制过程中对其进行更新。因此，一旦一个从站至少与支持GTID的主站连接一次，就可以将其切换为使用GTID，而无需任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: When a slave connects to a master, it can use either global transaction ID or old-style filename/offset to decide where in the master binlogs to start replicating from. To use global transaction ID, use the CHANGE MASTERmaster_use_gtid option:
trans-unit.target: 当从属服务器连接到主服务器时，它可以使用全局事务ID或旧式文件名/偏移量来决定从主服务器二进制日志中的哪个位置开始复制。要使用全局事务ID，请使用CHANGE MASTER master_use_gtid选项：

trans-unit.source: When a slave starts after being stopped for some time, or a new slave starts that was created from a backup from some time back, a lot of old binlog events may need to be downloaded from the master. If this happens from many slaves simultaneously, it can put a lot of load on the master.
trans-unit.target: 当一个从机在停止一段时间后启动,或从一段时间前的备份中创建的新从机启动时,可能需要从主站下载大量旧的 binlog 事件。如果这种情况同时发生在许多从机上,会给主站带来很大的负荷。

trans-unit.source: When a statement produces one or more error conditions (errors, warnings, notes) the conditions are inserted into the diagnostics area, and the statement information area is updated with that statement’s information. Usually, this also clears all the old conditions from the diagnostics area, but there is an exception: if the new statement is a correctly parsed RESIGNAL or GET DIAGNOSTICS, the old contents will remain in the diagnostics area. SIGNAL clears the old conditions.
trans-unit.target: 当一条语句产生一个或多个错误条件（错误，警告，注意）时，条件将插入诊断区域，并且语句信息区域将使用该语句的信息进行更新。通常，这还会清除诊断区域中的所有旧条件，但是有一个例外：如果新语句是正确解析的RESIGNAL或GET DIAGNOSTICS，则旧内容将保留在诊断区域中。SIGNAL清除旧条件。

trans-unit.source: When a stored procedure has been created, you invoke it by using the CALL statement (see CALL).
trans-unit.target: 创建存储过程后，可以使用 CALL 语句调用它（请参阅CALL）。

trans-unit.source: When a system-versioned tables is used in a view or in a subquery in the from clause, FOR SYSTEM_TIME can be used directly in the view or subquery body, or (non-standard) applied to the whole view when it's being used in a SELECT:
trans-unit.target: 在视图或from子句中的子查询中使用系统版本化的表时，可以直接在视图或子查询主体中使用 FOR SYSTEM_TIME ，或者在（非标准）应用于视图的子视图中使用（非标准） SELECT ：

trans-unit.source: When a table has an AUTO_INCREMENT column and a trigger or stored procedure executes an UPDATE statement against the table. Before MariaDB 5.5.3, all updates on tables with an AUTO_INCREMENT column were considered unsafe, as the order that the rows were updated could differ across servers.
trans-unit.target: 当表具有AUTO_INCREMENT列并且触发器或存储过程对表执行UPDATE语句时。在MariaDB 5.5.3之前，带有AUTO_INCREMENT列的表上的所有更新都被认为是不安全的，因为行的更新顺序在服务器之间可能不同。

trans-unit.source: When a table is created or the format altered, columns can be specified as accepting NULL values, or not accepting them, with the NULL and NOT NULL clauses respectively.
trans-unit.target: 创建表或更改格式时，可以分别使用 NULL 和 NOT NULL 子句将列指定为接受NULL值或不接受它们。

trans-unit.source: When a table is created with the Spider storage engine, the table links to the table on a remote server. The remote table can be of any storage engine. The table link is concretely achieved by the establishment of the connection from a local MariaDB server to a remote MariaDB server. The link is shared for all tables that are part of a the same transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Spider存储引擎创建表时,表会链接到远程服务器上的表。远程表可以是任何存储引擎的表。表链接是通过建立从本地MariaDB服务器到远程MariaDB服务器的连接来具体实现的。这个链接是为同一事务的所有表共享的。

trans-unit.source: When a table-based statement (like INSERT) is executed, the old data in the diagnostics area is cleared even if the statement doesn't produce any condition. However, statements which don't access any table (like SET, or a SELECT with no FROM clause) is executed and produces no warnings, the diagnostics area remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 当一个基于表的语句(如INSERT)被执行时,即使该语句没有产生任何条件,诊断区中的旧数据也会被清除。然而,不访问任何表的语句(如SET,或没有FROM子句的SELECT)被执行,并且没有产生任何警告,诊断区仍然没有变化。

trans-unit.source: When a timeout occurs, the Rpl_semi_sync_master_status status variable will also be switched to OFF.
trans-unit.target: 发生超时时， Rpl_semi_sync_master_status 状态变量也将切换为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: When a transaction updates a row in an InnoDB table, InnoDB's MVCC impleme...
trans-unit.target: 当一个事务更新InnoDB表中的一条记录时,InnoDB的MVCC实现了这一功能。
